DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if digital photography on a Smartphone and the Remote Food Photography Method (RFPM) can estimate infant formula intake. This is a validation study; there is no hypothesis.
DOC.brief_title: Remote Food Photography Method in Infants
DOC.criteria: â‰¥ 18 years of age Willing to complete 2 study visits at Pennington Biomedical (PBRC)
